title: Raw Truffles with Chia, Carob and Coconut
directions: To make the balls: process the walnuts, oats and carob in your food processor until they become a rough flour.
Add the rest of the ingredients and process until it sticks together. If it is still too crumbly or dry, add 1 tablespoon of liquid coconut oil or a few more dates.
Press the mix into balls with your hands.
ingredients: Dash of salt and vanilla, if desired
